title: Document Biclustering Using Spectral Co-Clustering Algorithm
description: In this lab, we will use the Spectral Co-clustering algorithm on the twenty newsgroups dataset to bicluster the documents. The dataset has 20 categories of documents and we will exclude the 'comp.os.ms-windows.misc' category as it contains posts with no data. The TF-IDF vectorized posts form a word frequency matrix which is then biclustered using Dhillon's Spectral Co-Clustering algorithm. The resulting document-word biclusters indicate subsets of words used more often in those subsets of documents. We will also cluster the documents using MiniBatchKMeans for comparison.

meta.title: Spectral Co-Clustering for Document Biclustering
meta.description: Explore the Spectral Co-Clustering algorithm for biclustering documents in the Twenty Newsgroups dataset.
meta.keywords: document biclustering, spectral co-clustering, twenty newsgroups, text mining, machine learning
